name.ch: 移民與社會：一九四九專題

goal.en: "Taiwan is an immigrant society. The movement of people in different periods has changed the historical appearance and social demographic structure of Taiwan society and enriched the humanistic appearance of Taiwan. The purpose of this course is to introduce the ""foreigners"" from the perspective of ""immigration and society"" from the perspective of ""1949-04"" to provide students with a knowledge base to understand the particularity and inner Differences, teaching topics include representative figures, historical context, population and cultural characteristics, occupation type, living space, marriage experience, relatives and family networks, economic behavior, class composition, political attitudes and behavior, identity selection, generation differences, dependents Preservation, immigration theory and so on."
goal.ch: 台灣是一個移民社會，不同時期的人口移動改變了台灣社會的歷史面貌與社會人口結構，也豐富了台灣的人文面貌。本課程的教學目標是從「移民與社會」的角度來介紹一九四九前後來台的「外省人」，提供修課學生具有知識基礎的觀點來認識這一波移民潮的特殊性與內在差異，講授主題包括代表性人物、歷史脈絡、人口與文化特徵、職業類型、居住空間、婚姻經驗、親屬與家庭網絡、經濟行為、階級組成、政治態度與行為、身份選擇、世代差異、眷村保存、移民理論等面向。
